message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $9500. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you.  Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8500. I believe this is a fair price considering the value the product will bring to me.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a lower price, but $8500 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $9000.  This still allows me to make a profit while giving you a good deal. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to come down to $9000, but I'm still a bit hesitant. I'm thinking more along the lines of $8200. I believe this is a fair price considering the value the product will bring to me.
